name: WT-HSEA® High Strength Fine Spray Adhesive
description: WT-HSEA® High Strength Fine Spray Adhesive similar to the HS® product, this adhesive is a high strength, easy application product with a fine spray that reduces telegraphing, making it ideal for thin or high gloss laminates or automotive headliners. Westech HSEA product is formulated as a non-methylene chloride, high strength/temperature, and low VOC solvent-based adhesive for industrial use.
